sentences.en: He held the trophy proudly aloft.
He proudly refused help from anyone.
sentences.cn: 他傲慢地拒绝了任何人的帮助.

sentences.en: He was grinning proudly, delighted with his achievements.
sentences.cn: 他为自己的成就感到喜悦,自豪地咧着嘴笑.
他骄傲地露出一口雪白的牙齿笑着说.

sentences.en: I view it as a call to action, and proudly sport it as a title.
sentences.cn: 我却把它看作一个行为的调令，并骄傲地将它作为一个标题。

sentences.en: On the first day he went to school,the boy wore his school cap proudly.
sentences.cn: 上学的第一天，男孩骄傲地戴上了他的校帽。

sentences.en: Our exporters proudly kept the flag flying at the international trade exhibition.
sentences.cn: 在国际贸易展览会上,我国的出口商为国争光.

sentences.en: Proudly lined up on a long bench , they stonily awaited their victims.
sentences.cn: 轿夫们把花炮全搬出来,放在门房里供人们赏鉴.

sentences.en: She gazed proudly at the shiny buckles on her shoes.
sentences.cn: 她骄傲地注视着鞋上闪亮的扣环.

sentences.en: She proudly displayed her collection of ornaments.
sentences.cn: 她得意扬扬地摆列出她的饰品集.

sentences.en: She proudly displayed her degree certificate to her parents.
sentences.cn: 她自豪地向父母展示了学位证书.
她得意地展示所获的奖品。

sentences.en: She smiled proudly, and two dimples appeared in her cheeks.
sentences.cn: 我看见她的脸上起了一道薄薄的红云,接着又露出很温和的微笑, 两颊上微微现出两个酒窝.

sentences.en: She'll go sailing proudly down the years in the epic of Dunkirk.
sentences.cn: 在敦刻尔克之役可歌可泣的历史中,它将年复一年地傲然前进.

sentences.en: The company proudly announced the launch of its new range of cars.
sentences.cn: 该公司骄傲地宣布其新一系列的轿车已投放市场.

sentences.en: They proudly declared themselves part of a new autonomous province.
sentences.cn: 他们自豪地宣布成为新自治省的一部分。

sentences.en: When I asked him if he could do so, he replied proudly, " What else?
sentences.cn: ”我问他是否做得到时, 他傲然地回答 “ 那还用问 吗 ?”

words.tran_cn: 傲慢地，自负地；得意洋洋地

trans.tran_cn: 自豪地，傲慢地，得意扬扬地，堂皇地
